1818248 THE ELECTION LAWS (EXTENSION TO SIKKIM) ACT, 1976
ACT NO. 10 OF 1976 [ 26th January, 1976.]
An Act to provide for the extension of the Representation of the People Act, 1950 and the Representation of the People Act, 1951, to the State of Sikkim.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Twenty- sixth Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
1
Short title and commencement.
1195640 1 Short title and commencement.
1010661 1This Act may be called the Election Laws (Extension to Sikkim) Act, 1976.
61285 2It shall be deemed to have come into force on the 9th day of September, 1975.
2
Extension and amendment of election laws.
382787 2 Extension and amendment of election laws.
1453679 1The Acts mentioned in the Schedule are hereby extended to, and shall be in force in, the State of Sikkim.
561623 2With effect from the commencement of this Act, the Acts men- tioned in the Schedule shall be amended as specified therein.
403254 3Any reference in the Acts mentioned in the Schedule to a law not in force, or to a functionary not in existence, in the State of Sikkim shall be construed as a reference to the corresponding law in force, or to the corresponding functionary in existence, in that State: Provided that if any question arises as to who such corresponding functionary is, or if there is no such corresponding functionary, the Central Government shall decide as to who such functionary will be and the decision of the Central Government shall be final.
3
Repeal and saving.
1774121 3 Repeal and saving.
131090 1The Election Laws (Extension to Sikkim) Ordinance, 1975, (9 of 1975) is hereby repealed.
1366534 2Notwithstanding such repeal, anything done or any action taken under or by virtue of the said Ordinance shall be deemed to have been done or taken under or by virtue of this Act.
